document.full_text: bahrain should investigate the death in police custody of three shi'ites, u.s.-based human rights watch (hrw) said on wednesday, saying one of the bodies bore signs of physical abuse.
document.title: bahrain should investigate deaths in custody: hrw
lines_and_colors: bahrain should investigate the death in police custody of three shi'ites, u.s.-based human rights watch (hrw) said on wednesday, saying one of the bodies bore signs of physical abuse.
